showScoreExcerpt:
“The seats may not move, but ‘Back to the Future: The Musical’ is nearly as transporting...At its best, it feels as if the whole theatre is traveling at 88mph with Marty McFly...It doesn’t make for a good musical, but it is a good show.”

Read more

keyPhrases.quote: It doesn't make for a good musical, but it is a good show.
